none: Letter to Louis L. McInnis from J. D. Lee, February 15, 1883
Letter to Louis L. McInnis from J. D. Lee, February 15, 1883
Box 1 Louis L. McInnis Papers/Box 1 Folder 13 Louis L. McInnis Papers

body.value:
[Header]

Agricultural and Mechanical College,
OF MISSISSIPPI.

[Box]

Executive Department,
S. D. LEE, PRESIDENT.

[Dateline]

Agricultural College, Feb'y 15' 1883

Prof L. L. McInnis
My Dear Sir
At your request, I sent to
Honble Geo. Pfeuffer at Austin, a 1/2 dozen
copies of report of Legislative Committee &
wrote him to that effect - I do hope your
Legislature will give you ample appro-
-priations and that you may eminently
succeed as an Industrial College - We
feel here that we are on the right road,
- We modeled after the Michigan College
and think we are an improvement
With best wishes,

[Signature]

Yours truly
S. D. Lee
